content.raw: I agree with you. Here is [[d72b690](https://bitbucket.org/nampi/ign-transport/commits/d72b6901a0b55b593b53a7a728a9be1f2c12f13f?at=default)] you can see an update. I add ```msgTypeName``` in ```NodeShared::OnNewConnection()```. I should add a message type in ```bool Node::Unsubscribe(const std::string &_topic)``` to send a message. But I don't have a message type in ```Unsubscribe```. I add ```std::string msgTypeName = "ignition::msgs::Empty";``` but I am not sure that it is the best way. Could you review this part of code in ```bool Node::Unsubscribe(const std::string &_topic)```, please?
content.html: I agree with you. Here is [d72b690] you can see an update. I add msgTypeName in NodeShared::OnNewConnection(). I should add a message type in bool Node::Unsubscribe(const std::string &_topic) to send a message. But I don't have a message type in Unsubscribe. I add std::string msgTypeName = "ignition::msgs::Empty"; but I am not sure that it is the best way. Could you review this part of code in bool Node::Unsubscribe(const std::string &_topic), please?
